title: Add Category Summary Command
description:
Add a `categories` command that shows spending per category in a table.

**Requirements:**
- Group transactions by category
- Show category name and total amount
- Use Rich Table with colored amounts
- Skip categories with $0 spent
instructions: Implement the categories command for the finance tracker.

testCases.description: Categories command shows spending grouped by category

hints.text: **Hint:** Use the `color` variable in the f-string markup. Use `console.print(table)` to display the table.
